topic.title: Appendix Amendments to other IFRS Standards

note.p: This appendix sets out the amendments to the Illustrative Examples for other IFRS Standards that are a consequence of the International Accounting Standards Board issuing IFRS 17 Insurance Contracts.

p.i: The amendments contained in this appendix when this Standard was issued in 2017 have been incorporated into the guidance on the relevant Standards included in this volume.
